intro: Tylophora dielsii, commonly known as the Chinese moonseed, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Apocynaceae. It is characterized by its woody stems and opposite, simple leaves that are usually elliptic or ovate in shape. The plant produces small, greenish-white flowers that are clustered in inflorescences, and its fruits are follicles containing numerous seeds. Tylophora dielsii is native to Southeast Asia and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions. It has been used in traditional medicine for its purported health benefits.
